hints.label: lem-kinetic-lsi-established
hints.title: Hypocoercive LSI for Ψ_kin (Established)
hints.content:
260: :label: lem-kinetic-lsi-established
261: 
262: The kinetic operator $\Psi_{\text{kin}}$ (Langevin dynamics) satisfies an LSI **with respect to its own invariant measure** $\pi_{\text{kin}}$:
263: 
264: $$
265: \text{Ent}_{\pi_{\text{kin}}}(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}}^{\text{kin}} \cdot \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\text{kin}}}[|\nabla f|^2]
266: $$
267: 
268: where:
269: $$
270: C_{\text{LSI}}^{\text{kin}} = \frac{1}{2\lambda_{\text{hypo}}}, \quad \lambda_{\text{hypo}} = c \cdot \min\left(\gamma, \frac{\alpha_U}{\sigma_v^2}\right)
271: $$
272: 
273: **Crucially**: This holds for **non-convex** $U(x)$ via hypocoercivity.
